accessible_from_desktop: Currently, this feature is only accessible from your desktop browser.
account_deleted: Your BeFunky account has been deleted.
acknowledge_cant_run_app: Your computer is unable to run BeFunky. You may be able to troubleshoot this issue by following the steps in the link below.
acknowledge_perf_issue: We’ve detected some browser settings that will cause BeFunky to run slowly. It only takes 2 minutes to make BeFunky run 5x faster—simply follow the steps in the link below.
acknowledge_session_expired: Sorry, your session has expired. Please save your work to your computer, refresh this page, then sign in again.
acknowledge_watermark_invalid_filetype: Invalid watermark file type. Please upload a JPG, PNG or GIF.
acknowledge_watermark_preset_name_taken: Name already in use; please try another.
acknowledge_watermark_upload_error: Unable to upload watermark. Please try again.
apple_appstore_prompt_no_restore_found: We could not find an active subscription to restore.
apple_appstore_prompt_no_restore_found_n: We could not find an active subscription to restore. Please sign in to your BeFunky account.
apple_appstore_prompt_sign_in_free: Your App Store account is connected to a BeFunky account {{email}}. Would you like to sign in to that account?
apple_appstore_prompt_sign_in_plus: Your App Store account is connected to a BeFunky account {{email}} that has an active Plus subscription. Would you like to sign in to that account?
apply_changes_leave_editor: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to apply those changes and leave the Photo Editor?
auto_save_disabled: Auto-saving in this tab was disabled when a new tab was opened. Remember to save your work before exiting.
autosave_description: We remember the last project you worked on just in case you want to continue editing at a later time. Would you like us to re-open your previous project?
autosave_yes: Yes, continue where I left off
background_remover_preview_modal_body_1: Our A.I. detected this subject in your photo.
background_remover_preview_modal_body_2: Use {{keep}} and {{remove}} with the brush settings to edit areas that require retouching.
background_remover_preview_modal_checkbo: If the results weren’t what you expected, please share your image with us to improve future results.
batch_file_size_body: This may cause extended processing and saving times, and in some devices, the browser may crash. Would you like to continue uploading or cancel and select fewer images?
batch_icon_guide_1: Add/Remove effects from your Batch Processing library wherever you see the {{icon}} icon.
batch_icon_guide_2: With Batch Processing you can upload multiple images and edit them all at the same time.
batch_processing_background_color: Note: Background color will be used only if images contain transparent areas.
batch_resize_padding_active: Note: Padding added only if necessary to prevent images from appearing stretched or squashed.
batch_resize_padding_inactive: Warning: Without padding, images may be stretched/squashed if the aspect ratio doesn't match the specified size.
billing_notice_free_trial: Billing automatically begins when your free trial ends, and your subscription will auto-renew until cancelled. Cancel your trial or subscription anytime.
billing_notice_subscription: Your subscription will auto-renew until cancelled. Cancel your subscription anytime.
billing_summary_annual: You will be billed {{amount}} today for your annual subscription. By upgrading you agree to our {{renewal_policy}}. You can cancel anytime.
billing_summary_annual_trial: You won’t be charged today. You will be automatically billed {{amount}} for your annual subscription at the end of your trial period. By upgrading you agree to our {{renewal_policy}}. You can cancel anytime.
billing_summary_monthly: You will be billed {{amount}} today for your monthly subscription. By upgrading you agree to our {{renewal_policy}}. You can cancel anytime.
billing_summary_monthly_trial: You won’t be charged today. You will be automatically billed {{amount}} for your monthly subscription at the end of your trial period. By upgrading you agree to our {{renewal_policy}}. You can cancel anytime.
browser_block_social_login: Your browser blocked the {{provider}} login popup. Please try again.
cancel_via_paypal: To complete the process, sign in to PayPal and cancel this subscription in the Automatic Payments section.
cancellation_monthly_new_price: Your Plus subscription is {{user_price}}/mo. If you cancel today and resubscribe in the future, your subscription rate will increase. Currently, a monthly subscription is {{current_price}}/mo.
cancellation_prompt: If you decide to cancel, your account will automatically switch to the Free plan on {{next_billing_date}}. Until then, you'll still have access to all the BeFunky Plus features.
cancellation_yearly_new_price: Your Plus subscription is {{user_price}}/yr. If you cancel today and resubscribe in the future, your subscription rate will increase. Currently, a yearly subscription is {{current_price}}/yr.
caption: Caption
change_download_folder: Want to change the folder where your artwork gets saved?
checked_your_computer: We’ve checked your computer and web browser’s compatibility with BeFunky.
chromeos_prompt_sign_in_plus: Welcome back! Your Google Play account has an active BeFunky Plus subscription. Please sign in to the {{email}} BeFunky account to access Plus features.
click_when_selected: Click when selected to edit text
collage_wizard_empty_guide: To browse your layout options, select your images then click the "Use Images" button
complete_in_browser: Please open BeFunky in your web browser to complete this action.
computer_meets_the_requirements: Your computer meets the requirements to run the latest version of BeFunky.
confirm_apply_source_texture: Revert to original image? All history will be reset.
confirm_cancel: Are you sure you would like to cancel?
confirm_clear_all_images: Are you sure you would like to clear all images?
confirm_delete_befunky_photo: Are you sure you would like to permanently delete this photo from BeFunky?
confirm_delete_multiple_projects: Are you sure you would like to delete these {{number}} projects from BeFunky permanently?
confirm_delete_one_project: Are you sure you would like to delete this project from BeFunky permanently?
confirm_delete_watermark_preset: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
confirm_edit_image: Image currently in Photo Editor will be overwritten. Continue?
confirm_folder_delete_befunky: Would you like to delete or keep all projects inside the folder?
confirm_fullscreen_mode: Fullscreen mode is a premium feature, you'll need to upgrade to BeFunky Plus to use it. Want to try it out?
confirm_hide: Are you sure you would like to hide the application?
confirm_keep_projects: Do you want to keep your uploaded images and open projects for further editing?
confirm_layer_save_login: You must be signed in to save your layer to BeFunky for later use. Sign in now?
confirm_load_autosave: We found an open project from your last session; would you like to continue editing this project or start a new one?
confirm_project_change: You have an open {{app_section}} project that hasn't been saved. Do you want to save the project to your BeFunky account before starting a new project?
confirm_project_overwrite: An existing project already exists with this name. Would you like to overwrite it?
confirm_remove_unused_images: Are you sure you want to remove all unused images from the Image Manager?
confirm_resend_verification_email: An email was already sent. Would you like to re-send it?
confirm_reset: You’re about to start a new project. Your current project will be cleared and all unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure you would like to continue?
confirm_sharing_login: Please sign in or sign up to use the social sharing features
confirm_swap_fonts: While opening your project, we were unable to locate some of the fonts used. You may Cancel and install them, or Continue and the following font replacements will be made:
confirm_template_change: Your current template will be cleared and all unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure you would like to continue?
confirm_template_mode_change: Switch Template Modes? All images, graphics and text will be cleared.
connect_facebook_load_albums: Connect to Facebook to load your photo albums
connect_google_load_albums: Connect to Google Photos to load your albums
contact_our_support_team: If you’re having trouble with BeFunky, please contact our support team for assistance.
contact_support_thanks: Thanks! A member of our support team will be in touch shortly.
contact_support_form_attachments: Would you like to include any attachments?
contact_support_form_cc_last_charge: What is the date of your last charge?
contact_support_form_cc_name: What is the name on the credit card?
contact_support_form_device: What type of device are you using?
contact_support_form_email: What's your email address? If you have a BeFunky account, please use the email you use to sign in.
contact_support_form_other_emails: Do you have any other emails that you've used with BeFunky?
contact_support_form_trouble: Please tell us what you're having trouble with today
cookie_banner: We use cookies to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can find out more in our {{privacy_policy}}.
create_your_own_canvas: Create your own canvas size or choose from our blank canvas presets
cutout_guide_export_as_layer: Create a new layer that will be added to your Image Manager.
delete_account_app_store: If you'd like to delete your account and all your associated data, you'll first need to visit the App Store to cancel your subscription, then return to BeFunky to delete your account. If you?ve already canceled your subscription, restart BeFunky to complete the last step of the deletion process.
delete_account_contact_support: If you're having an issue with BeFunky, {{contact_support}} to let us know what's up.
delete_account_email_sent: We've sent you an email with instructions on completing your account deletion. If you decide that you no longer want to delete your account, simply disregard the email.
delete_account_first_paragraph: It looks like you’ve decided to close your account. Hopefully, it’s not because of something we did... but if it is, let us know at {{email}} so that we can make it better.
delete_account_info_1: If you would like to stop being charged for a subscription, you can {{cancel_anytime}} and leave your account active. This way, you’ll maintain access to all of the projects you’ve saved to BeFunky.
delete_account_info_2: But if you are set on deleting your account, we won’t stop you! Please know that this means your account settings, photos, projects, and any other data associated with your account will be permanently deleted.
delete_account_paypal: To proceed with deleting your account, you'll first need to sign in to PayPal and go to the Automatic Payments section to cancel your subscription.
delete_account_second_paragraph: If you click 'Yes' below, you’ll receive an email with instructions on completing the account closure process. If you don't want to delete your account at this time, simply click the 'Cancel' button below.
delete_account_verify_email: To proceed with deleting your account, you'll first need to verify your email address.
delete_your_account: Do you really wish to delete your BeFunky account? If you ever decide to come back, you'll need to sign up again from scratch.
demo_mode_announcement_body: BeFunky is an all-in-one online Creative Platform that has everything you need to easily edit photos, create graphic designs, and make photo collages.
demo_mode_dialog_body: This feature is not available while the app is being used in Demo Mode.
designer_template_upgrade: This template is only available to BeFunky Plus subscribers.
disable_modal: Don't show this to me again
download_images_multiple: We detected some large images and had to create additional folders to improve downloading. Be sure to click each folder to download.
download_images_single: Click the file below to start downloading
drag_drop_fonts: Drag and drop font files here or click to upload from your computer.
drag_drop_image_bfd: Drop your project or image here
drag_or_double_click_pattern: Drag pattern into cell or double click to add to background
edit_layer_announcement_body: Adjust exposure, correct colors, add Artsy effects, and more! Now, all our essential editing tools are available for your image layers. When you’re finished editing, click {{done_editing_image}} to continue with your project.
email_already_verified: Your email address has already been verified.
email_successfully_verified: Your email address has been successfully verified. Thank you!
error_account_info: We’re unable to fetch your account information. Please try again or {{contact_support}} if you continue to experience issues.
error_already_upgraded: You already have a BeFunky Plus subscription. Please refresh your browser.
error_close_account: Sorry, an error occurred while attempting to close your account.
error_duplicate_project_name: This project name is already in use.
error_email_already_in_use: Sorry, this email is already in use. Try signing in or use another email.
error_email_mismatch: The emails you've entered do not match
error_email_not_registered: Sorry, this email address is not registered on BeFunky
error_email_password: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.
error_fetch_image_befunky: Please sign in to the BeFunky account associated with this image and try again.
error_file_size_is_large: File size cannot be larger than
error_incomplete_expiry: Your card's expiration date is incomplete
error_indexeddb_image: Unable to get locally stored image
error_invalid_access_token: Social sign-in failed. Please try again.
error_invalid_csrf_token: Sorry, this page has expired. Please refresh and try again.
error_invalid_cvc: Your card's security code is incorrect
error_invalid_expiry_month: Your card's expiration month is invalid
error_invalid_expiry_year: Your card's expiration year is invalid
error_invalid_phone: This phone number is incorrect, please try again.
error_invalid_response: An error has occurred. Please try again.
error_load_autosave: Sorry, an error occurred which prevented the open project from your last session from being loaded. You can try again or start a new project.
error_load_image_refresh: Please try again. If it still fails to load, you may want to try saving your work and refreshing this page.
error_load_image_restart: Please try again. If it still fails to load, you may want to try saving your work and restarting this app.
error_no_relevant_results: Sorry, we were unable to return relevant search results. Please try a different search term.
error_not_logged_in: Sorry, you must be signed in to use this service. Please sign in and try again.
error_not_logged_in_projects: Sorry, you must sign in to BeFunky to access your saved projects.
error_old_browser: Your browser is outdated. Please update to a more recent version.
error_old_mac: Your Mac is running an old version of MacOS. We require at least OS X Yosemite 10.10.
error_old_twa: Thanks so much for using BeFunky! We just released a brand new version of the app that supports more devices. This version will no longer be supported. Please head over to the Play Store to download the new app.
error_old_windows: Your PC is running an old version of Windows. We require at least Windows 7.
error_opening_project: Sorry, we were unable to open your project {{project_name}} in {{app_section}}.
error_password_mismatch: The passwords you've entered do not match
error_please_refresh: Please refresh this page and try again, or {{contact_support}} if you continue to experience issues.
error_processing_payment: We are unable to authenticate your payment method. Please choose a different payment method and try again.
error_request_failed: Sorry, unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_trial_found: Looks like you've already used a BeFunky Plus trial. To use our Plus features you'll need to pay for the upgrade.
error_file_total_size_is_large: You have exceeded the total file size limit
error_webgl_unavailable:
{{your_browser}} is having trouble loading BeFunky; please reload this browser tab.

If you see this message again, restart your browser or try using {{alternate_browser}}.

If this issue persists, please {{contact_support}}
error_webgl_unavailable_app:
{{your_browser}} is having trouble loading BeFunky; please restart this app.

If this issue persists, please {{contact_support}}
error_webglcontextlost: Something went wrong. Please restart your browser.
error_webglcontextlost_app: Something went wrong. Please restart this app.
error_webglcontextlost_autosave: We’ll re-open your project so you won’t lose your place.
error_webglcontextlost_install_app: If restarting your browser does not fix this issue, you may want to try installing the {{mobile_app}}.
error_webglcontextlost_low_perf: This issue may be due to performance issues with your browser. {{learn_how_to_fix}}.
error_webglcontextlost_restart: If restarting your browser does not fix this issue, you may want to try using {{alternate_browser}}.
error_you_can_add_max_file: You can add a maximum of 10 files.
explore_subtitle: The place to look for inspiration in the BeFunky Community
facebook_access_email: Please allow BeFunky to access your Facebook email
facebook_access_user_photos: Please allow BeFunky to access your Facebook photos
facebook_email_login_failed: We're unable to access the email linked to your Facebook account. Please check your Facebook settings and try again, or try registering with your email.
feature_search_announcement_body: If you already know what you’re looking for, why waste time scrolling? Press {{shortcut}} from the Dashboard or anywhere in the app to quickly navigate to your favorite tools, effects, and features. Workflow, optimized!
feature_search_announcement_heading: {{new!}} Feature Search finds your favorites, fast!
feature_search_shortcut: Search from anywhere in BeFunky using {{shortcut}}
flatten_layers_warning: Flattening layers will rasterize your text making it appear pixelated when you’re zoomed in past 100%.
font_announcement_body: All the fonts you could ever need, right in BeFunky. Now you can browse and instantly add Google Fonts or drag-and-drop them right from your computer. And not only is adding new fonts even easier, you can now access your fonts from any computer you sign in to!
font_clue_manage_body: Here you can view all your fonts in one place, add fonts from your computer, or import them from Google Fonts.
font_italic_not_supported: Italic font styles are not supported
font_not_available: Can't find the font you're looking for? {{learn_more}} about adding fonts to BeFunky.
free_trials_are_one_time_offer: Free trials are a one time offer. It looks like you’ve used a free trial before and are not eligible for a trial at this time.
get_started_collage: Combine multiple photos into one with a grid layout
get_started_designer: Templates for creating banners, flyers, cards, & more
get_started_editor: Photo effects and tools for enhancing your photos
get_started_heading: What Would You Like to Do Today?
google_drive_access: Please allow BeFunky to access your Google Drive
google_photos_access: Please allow BeFunky to access your Google Photos
guide_alignment_options: Precise layer alignment made easy. Use Guides to set visual alignment markers, enable Snapping to quickly align layers, and enable Display Distances for perfect layer alignment.
guide_batch_edit: Edit all your photos at the same time!
guide_batch_edit_steps: Choose from hundreds of editing tools by clicking "Manage Tools" or wherever you see the {{icon}} icon.
guide_batch_upload: Upload hundreds of photos all at once!
guide_batch_upload_steps: Click "Add Images" or drag and drop your images to get started.
guide_blemish_fix_protip_1: Set your brush size slightly larger than the blemish, then click on the blemish until it disappears (typically 1-3 times).
guide_clone: Select your source by clicking anywhere on your photo. To select a new source, simply click the "Source Selection" button.
guide_clone_protip: To quickly select a new source, hold Control/Command and click.
guide_collage_wizard_next: Click the arrows to browse layouts
guide_funkyfocus_protip_1: Press the Space Bar to hide the on-canvas controls.
guide_funkyfocus_protip_2: In Radial and Square mode, hold Shift to lock the aspect ratio.
guide_global_history: Use your History to step back to a previous edit.
guide_liquify_protip_1: To use Smudge, click on your image and drag. To use Grow/Shrink, click on your image and hold.
guide_smart_resize: With Smart Resize, we’ll resize your layers as well as your template background.
guide_template_library: Start your design with a template or create a custom-sized blank canvas.
guide_text: Click "Add Text" if you'd like to create your text overlay from scratch. You can also select one of our presets and customize it to exactly what you want.
guide_upload_photo: Please open a photo or project to get started
image_ready: Your artwork is ready and downloading.
install_app: Install BeFunky for the best experience.
keep_subscription_body: We like having you around! If you decide to keep your BeFunky Plus subscription today, we'd like to show our appreciation by offering you a 30% discount for the next 2 months.
keep_subscription_confirmation: Your 30% discount will be applied to your next 2 monthly payments. You can view your billing history from your My Account page.
keep_subscription_thank_you: Thanks for continuing your BeFunky Plus subscription!
learn_how_to_fix: Learn how to fix them here
learn_what_all: Learn what all you can do with BeFunky
leave_feedback_body: What can we do better? Submit your suggestions and comments.
login_load_images: Sign in to BeFunky to load your images
login_load_projects: Sign in to BeFunky to load your projects
manage_app_store_subscription: Manage your subscription on App Store
manage_play_subscription: Manage your subscription on Google Play
message_designer_project_save: Saving as a project creates a file you can edit with BeFunky after it's been saved.
mobile_plus_setup: Sign in on Mobile to finish setting up your Plus Account
mobile_plus_setup_body: Once you have the mobile app installed, login to your BeFunky Plus account to access all your Plus features, saved projects, and photos!
my_account_unsubscribed: You've successfully canceled your subscription. You will not be billed again. Feel free to use your previously paid plan until {{plan_expiration_date}}. You can resubscribe on the {{my_account_link}} page.
my_account_unsubscribed_immediately: You've successfully canceled your subscription. You will not be billed again.
name: Name
native_app_announcement_body: Download our NEW mobile app to access all of the desktop features you love – right on your smartphone and tablet. Find all of the projects and photos you’ve saved to BeFunky, as well as everything your Plus subscription has to offer, synced across all of your devices. Available on {{google_play}} and the {{app_store}}.
native_app_prompt_body: We won’t stop you from using BeFunky in your browser, but, if you want best experience, download the app!
new_version_available: A new version of BeFunky is available
newsletters_description: Creative inspiration straight from our blog
next_step_mobile_body: Don't forget this step! Complete your Plus account setup by installing our mobile app to take full use of your plus features and access your saved projects and photos anywhere you go.
next_step_mobile_heading: Next Step, Install our Mobile App
no_befunky_photos: You don’t have any photos saved to BeFunky.
no_close_account: No, I don't want to close it
no_colors_in_library: You haven’t added any colors to your library yet. {{learn_more}}
no_favorites: You currently have no favorites in this section.
no_favorites_message: You haven't favorited any fonts yet. {{learn_more}} about favoriting fonts.
no_groups: Select layers to create a group. {{learn_more}}
no_receipts: You don’t have any receipts yet
no_results_for: Sorry, we couldn't find any results for {{query}}
no_results_in_folder: You haven't saved any projects to this folder that match your filters
no_saved_projects: You haven’t saved any projects to your BeFunky account yet.
no_saved_projects_in_folder: You haven’t saved any projects to this folder yet.
no_signed_in_devices: You don’t have any signed-in devices.
no_user_defined_fonts_message: You haven't added any fonts yet. {{learn_more}} about adding fonts.
open_image_library: Add images from BeFunky, Google Photos, and Facebook
paste_as_layer_or_background: Would you like to paste your image as a layer or use it to replace your background image?
paste_as_layer_or_grid_cell: Would you like to paste your images as layers or use them to fill empty collage grid cells?
payment_failed_announcement_body: We just tried to renew your subscription, but unfortunately the payment wasn't successful. To keep your account active, please update your billing information.
payment_failed_notification: Your recent payment failed. Please update your credit card info.
payment_modal_digicert: 256-bit SSL encrypted. Your information is 100% safe.
payment_modal_subheading_trial: Confirm your plan, you won’t be billed until the end of your trial period. Cancel anytime.
photo_title_length: Title must be between 4-100 characters in length
photos_public_verify_email: Before you can make photos public, you'll need to verify your email address.
please_enter_watermark_preset_name: Please enter a name for your template.
previous_plan: Feel free to use your previously paid plan until {{next_billing_date}}.
pricing_modal_graphic_body: Finding the right graphic has never been easier. With BeFunky Plus you’ll gain access to thousands of premium graphics, stickers, and icons.
pricing_modal_subline1: All the features at one low price. No hidden fees. Cancel anytime.
pricing_modal_trial_subheading: Try out all our premium features for 7 days. Cancel anytime.
project_folders_empty: Click the + icon to create your first folder.
project_manager_drag_to_folder: Drag and drop your project to add it to a folder
prompt_use_appstore_account: Your App Store account is connected to a BeFunky account {{email}}. Sign in to that account.
pwa_announcement_body: Getting and staying creative with BeFunky just got easier. You can now access BeFunky from a dedicated window on your desktop! Don’t lose your project by accidentally closing BeFunky or misplacing it in a sea of tabs. Streamline your creativity by installing BeFunky to your desktop today.
pwa_announcement_headline: {{new!}} Now You Can Install BeFunky to Your Desktop!
register_after_subscribe_body: You’ve unlocked every tool you’ll ever need for photo editing, collage making, and graphic design! Create a BeFunky account to access your Plus features across all your devices.
register_after_subscribe_heading: Thanks for Subscribing! Create an Account to Get Plus on Any Device
register_modal_create_account_terms: By creating an account you agree to our
register_modal_password_error: Please enter a password of at least six characters
replace_or_mask: The target image contains transparency. Would you like to replace it or use it to mask the dropped image?
report_abuse_prompt_1: Please only report photos that are in violation of BeFunky’s policies:
report_abuse_prompt_2: ie. Nudity, illegal content, the promotion and glorification of self-harm, violence or extreme hatred against individuals or groups on the basis of race, ethnic origin, religion, disability, gender, age, veteran status, or sexual orientation.
report_abuse_sorry: We’re sorry you had to see that...
report_abuse_thank_you: Thank you for helping to keep BeFunky safe for everyone. Our team has been alerted and we’ll review the photo in question.
reset_password_email_sent: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
reset_password_link_invalid: Your Password Reset Link Is Invalid
reset_password_link_options: Your password reset link is either invalid or expired. We can {{send_new_link}} or, if you remember your password, you can {{sign_in}}.
reset_password_modal_enter_email: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
reset_password_modal_remember: If you remember your password you can sign in here
save_then_refresh: Please save your work and then press {{shortcut}} to refresh and get the latest version.
save_then_reopen: Please save your work and then restart the app to get the latest version.
select_subscriptions: Select the email subscriptions that most interest you:
sign_in_notification: Looks like you're not signed in. For the fastest response be sure to {{sign_in}} to your account.
sign_in_saved_images: Please sign-in to use images saved to your BeFunky account.
sorry_to_see_you_go: We're Sorry To See You Go...
success_subscription_restored: We found your active subscription and restored it.
support_questions_heading: What Can We Help You With Today?
support_questions_cancel: I want to cancel my BeFunky Plus subscription
support_questions_plus_access: I am unable to access my Plus features on my account
support_questions_refund: I am requesting a refund for my Plus subscription
support_questions_charge: I have an unrecognized charge from BeFunky
support_questions_multiple_charges: I was charged multiple times for this billing period
support_questions_other: I'm having another issue that isn't listed
survey_use_case_prompt: We'd like to help you get the most out of your BeFunky Plus subscription. Can you tell us how you use BeFunky?
teaser_artsy: Turn your photos into cartoons, paintings, sketches, and more! Our Artsy effects are among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_background: Create solid or transparent backgrounds with ease. The Background tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_background_remover_body: Erase image backgrounds in a single click! Our A.I. powered Background Remover automatically detects the subject in your photo and removes the background around it. Use it to create the perfect transparent or solid colored background for your products, portraits, pet photos, and more.
teaser_background_remover_title: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to Unlock The Background Remover
teaser_batch_processing: Crop, Resize, and edit hundreds of photos at the same time. Batch Processing is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_clarity: Easily enhance the textural detail of your photos. The Clarity tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_clone: Easily erase objects from your photos. The Clone tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_collage_wizard: Create a perfect collage without cropping or resizing any of your images. The Collage Wizard is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_color_management_body: Finding your favorite colors has never been easier! Use the Picker to select a color and then add it to your Library for easy access anywhere on BeFunky.
teaser_color_management_heading: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to Use Color Management
teaser_cutout: Remove an object from your photo in seconds. The Cutout tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_default: Exercise your creative freedom, unlock hundreds of premium features when you upgrade to BeFunky Plus.
teaser_edit_layer_body: Edit image layers with ease. Bring all the essential tools and effects from our Photo Editor right to your image layer, all without leaving your project.
teaser_enhance_dlx: Smart tools that analyze your photos and enhance them where they need it. Our Enhance DLX tools are among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_fill_light: Enhance the detail hidden in the shadows of your photo. The Fill Light tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_font_management: Get all the fonts you need, all in one place. Add Google Fonts in a single click or drag-and-drop fonts from your computer to create your own custom font library.
teaser_funky_focus: Put the focus anywhere you want. Funky Focus is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_glow: Bring out the brilliance of the lights within your photos. The Glow tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_isolate_subject_body: In a single click, we can detect and isolate the subject in your photo to help you add effects selectively. Blur backgrounds in your product photography, add bokeh behind your portrait, Cartoonize your pet while keeping the background realistic, and more!
teaser_lens_flares: Give your photos a beautiful, sun-soaked look. Our Lens Flares are among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_modal_heading: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to Unlock {{this_feature}}
teaser_paywall_body: Start a FREE 7-day trial for full access to ALL of our premium features. Take your creativity to the next level. Get started now and let your imagination run wild.
teaser_paywall_heading: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to Save Your Image
teaser_photo_effects: Give your photos a whole new aesthetic. Our Photo Effects are among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_plus_templates: The template you're trying to open is only available to BeFunky Plus subscribers. Upgrade now to open your template and gain access to additional design templates, photo editing tools, and our Collage Maker!
teaser_plus_templates_heading: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to Open Your Template
teaser_replace_color: Replace colors with the click of a button. The Replace Color tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_reshape: Smudge, grow, and shrink areas of your images. The Reshape tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_save_collage: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to unlock the Collage Wizard, your one-click solution to creating perfect collages.
teaser_save_designer: Upgrade to BeFunky Plus to unlock hundreds of professional-quality premium design templates.
teaser_save_editor: Get access to the right tools when you need them. Unlock hundreds of premium features when you upgrade to BeFunky Plus.
teaser_touchup: Get perfect, blemish free skin everytime. Our Touch Up tools are among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_vibrance: Make the colors in your photos pop! The Vibrance tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
teaser_vignette: Bring the eye of your viewer right to the subject of your photo. The Vignette tool is among the hundreds of features you’ll unlock with BeFunky Plus.
text_message_disclaimer: Message and data rates may apply
thank_you_confirmation: Thanks for submitting your inquiry, you'll get an email confirmation and we'll respond shortly.
thank_you_confirmation_logged_in: To follow up on your support request, visit your {{activities_page}}.
thank_you_confirmation_logged_in_email: To follow up on your support request, check your email.
thanks_for_staying: We’re happy you’re staying! If you ever have questions along the way, our Support team is here to help.
tips_to_learn: Photo editing and design tips and techniques
title: Edit Title
try_mobile_app: While this feature is best experienced from your desktop browser, you’ll find a version of it in our mobile app.
try_safari: Sorry, this feature is currently not supported in this browser. Please use Safari to experience this feature.
tutorial_guides: Step-by-step guides for all our features
tutorial_link_change_setting: Here's how to change this setting
upgrade_yearly_modal_body: Switching to our yearly plan just makes sense. Over the course of 12 months you could save more than {{amount_saved}} with the yearly plan. Switch today and we’ll also take 10% off, making the first year of your yearly plan only {{discounted_annual_price}} (reg. {{regular_annual_price}})!
upgrade_yearly_modal_body_2_months: Switching to our yearly plan just makes sense. Over the course of 12 months you could save more than {{amount_saved}} with the yearly plan, that’s like getting 2 months of BeFunky Plus for free. Switch today and we’ll also take 10% off, making the first year of your yearly plan only {{discounted_annual_price}} (reg. {{regular_annual_price}})!
upgrade_yearly_modal_heading: Switch to a Yearly Plan and Save!
upgrade_yearly_success: Success! Your account has been switched to an annual subscription.
use_non_chrome_browser: Please use another browser like Edge or Firefox
user_already_logged_in: Looks like you've signed-in in a different tab.
user_dashboard_free: You’re signed in to a BeFunky Free account.
user_dashboard_plus: You’re signed in to your BeFunky Plus account.
user_not_logged_in_refresh: Sorry, you are no longer signed in to {{email}}. Please save your work to your computer, refresh this page, then sign in again.
user_offline: It appears that you're offline. Please check your internet connection before continuing.
username_change_warning: Choose carefully. You can only change it once.
username_length: Username must be between 4-100 characters in length
verification_email_sent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
welcome_features: With your new account, you can sync your personalized settings as well as all the projects and media you've saved to BeFunky across all your devices!
welcome_plus_subscription_body: You now have everything you'll need to create stunning photos, beautiful collages, and eye catching designs! There's a lot you can do with BeFunky Plus, here's a collection of tutorials and some creative inspiration to help get you started!
